content.data:
[Y]Debugging Routine
[W]Calm method beats frantic edits.
[c][m.]
[W]Shrink bugs into tiny reproducible
[W]cases, then test one change at a time.
[W]Write assumptions down; most hard bugs
[W]are hidden assumptions.
[c][m.]
[G]- Reproduce first.
[G]- Isolate variables.
[G]- Log observed values.
[m][m-]
[Y]WORKFLOW
[C]Slow is smooth, smooth is fast.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
